revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-868L |revision=A1 |series=AC1750 |upc=790069389719 |asin=B00C9VB318 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model=WRG-AC02 |manuf_rev=A1 |availability=common |est_release_date=04/11/2013 |fcc_date=02/07/2013 |fcc_id=KA2IR868LA1, RRK2012060056-1 |ic_id=4216A-IR868LA1, 4833A-WMCAC01A1 |pcb_id=8WRGAC02.1A1G |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4708 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G100TFI00 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT47H64M16HR-25E:H |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 3.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 10-pad header,, JP2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, JP1 |wi1_module=Alpha Networks WMC-AC01 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4331 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks (SiGe);SE5003L;;3; ,,, 5GHz GaAs SPDT Switch;Skyworks;SKY13351-378LF;;3; ,,, 5GHz LNA IC;Skyworks;SKY65404-31;;3; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, FreshTomato-ARM, Tomato (Shibby), AdvancedTomato |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=dlink-XXXX,dlink-XXXX-media |default_ssid_regex=^dlink-[a-f0-9A-F]{4}$,,,^dlink-[a-f0-9A-F]{4}-media$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |oui=C8:D3:A3 |oui_eth=C8:D3:A3 }} {{TagLine|Wireless AC1750 Dual Band Gigabit Cloud Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.dlink.com/us/en/home-solutions/connect/routers/dir-868l-wireless-ac1750-dual-band-gigabit-router}} {{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model=DIR-868L}}
*"WRGAC02" and "8WRGAC02.1A1G" is silkscreened on the main board. *"8WMCAC01.2A1G" is silkscreened on the wireless module in the photos. :This device may use BCM47081A0 (one core). It is clearly a BCM4708x SoC. :RAM: ''EtronTech'' EM6GD16EWXC-15H (256MB) - (Rev. B1 ?)
Default settings are per the FCC docs... :Per the FCC datasheet, the wireless module is using... *3x ''[[Skyworks]]'' (''SiGe'') [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=969 SE5003L] - 5GHz Power Amplifier ICs *3x ''[[Skyworks]]'' [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=711 SKY13351-378LF] - 5GHz GaAs SPDT Switches *3x ''[[Skyworks]]'' [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=676 SKY65404-31] - 5GHz LNA ICs
{{WiFiCert|WFA18277|11/25/2013}}
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32110-d-link-dir-868l-wireless-ac1750-dual-band-gigabit-cloud-router-reviewed Reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.shadowandy.net/2013/08/d-link-dir-868l-wireless-ac1750-dual-band-gigabit-cloud-router-review.htm Reviewed on '''ShadowAndy'''] *[http://foxnetlab.com/index.php/16-reviews/91-dir-868l-or-the-first-router-with-support-of-802-11ac-by-d-link Reviewed on '''FoxNetLab''']
===Third-party Firmware=== *[https://wiki.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/D-Link_DIR-868L '''DD-WRT'' FW] *[http://www.linksysinfo.org/index.php?threads/d-link-dir-868l-another-great-arm-router-supported-by-tomato.70489/ '''Tomato (Shibby)''' FW]
===Disassembly=== The case is held together by 6 screws. :3 are on top, under the golden sticker ring :3 are on the bottom, under the feet
===See also=== *[[D-Link DIR-850L rev A1]] • [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32184-d-link-dir-850l-wireless-ac1200-dual-band-gigabit-cloud-router-reviewed SNB review] *[[D-Link DIR-860L rev A1]] • [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32211-d-link-dir-860l-wireless-ac1200-dual-band-gigabit-cloud-router-reviewed SNB review] :[[Alpha Networks WMC-AC01]] :[[Alpha Networks WMC-AC02]]
